data.name: msgBrowserBack
data.value: Back|A tool-tip for a browser back button

data.name: msgBrowserExit
data.value: Exit|A tool-tip for a browser exit button

data.name: msgBrowserForward
data.value: Forward|A tool-tip for a browser forward button

data.name: msgBrowserRefresh
data.value: Refresh|A tool-tip for a browser refresh button

data.name: msgCancel
data.value: Cancel|As in a Cancel button

data.name: msgError
data.value: Error|A message describing that some kind of error occurred.

data.name: msgJumToStart
data.value: Jump to start|A text describing a button tool-tip that jumps the playback to the start

data.name: msgMarkItemAsWatched
data.value: Mark as watched?|A short (in text length) question whether or not to mark a file or a directory as watched

data.name: msgOK
data.value: OK|As in an OK button

data.name: msgPause
data.value: Pause|A text describing a button tool-tip that pauses the playback

data.name: msgPlay
data.value: Play|As in a tool-tip to describe user clicking the play button

data.name: msgPlaybackFromThebeginng
data.value: The beginning|A message describing that the playback should be started from the beginning

data.name: msgPlaybackPosition
data.value: Playback position|A tool-tip for describing a text box with time

data.name: msgPlaybackPositionSlider
data.value: Seek|A slider with current playback position

data.name: msgPlayBackThreeDots
data.value: Playback...|A message describing if something should be done for the playback

data.name: msgRewind
data.value: Rewind|A text describing a button tool-tip starts winding the playback backwards with a higher speed

data.name: msgSavedPlaybackPositionContinue
data.value: Continue from {0}|A message describing a saved playback position to continue the playback from

data.name: msgSeekEnd
data.value: Jump to end|A text describing a button tool-tip that jumps the playback to the end. The playback window is closed.

data.name: msgStop
data.value: Stop|A text describing a button tool-tip that stops the playback and closes the playback window

data.name: msgMenu
data.value: Menu|A tool-tip for a context menu button

data.name: msgUrl
data.value: URL|A tool-tip for a browser URL address

data.name: msgVLCLibMissing
data.value: The VLC Library is missing. The playback will be aborted.|As in the VLC library (dll's and stuff) is missing, so no video playback will occur!

data.name: msgVolumePercentage
data.value: Volume: {0}%|As in a tool-tip to describe volume and its percentage value

data.name: msgWindForward
data.value: Wind|A text describing a button tool-tip starts winding the playback forward with a higher speed

data.name: msgInvalidURL
data.value: The given URL is invalid: '{0}'.|A navigation error occurred in a web browser form.

data.name: msgNext
data.value: Next|A text describing a button tool-tip of a button to jump to a next item in the playback

data.name: msgPrevious
data.value: Previous|A text describing a button tool-tip of a button to jump to a previous item in the playback

data.name: msgQueue
data.value: Queue|A text describing a button tool-tip of a button to show only queued items in a play list

data.name: msgRandom
data.value: Random|A text describing a button tool-tip of a button to toggle play list randomization

data.name: msgRepeat
data.value: Repeat|A text describing a button tool-tip of a button to toggle playback repeat mode

data.name: msgWindowExit
data.value: Exit|A tool-tip for a window close/exit button

data.name: msgItemRating
data.value: Rating|Rating for a item in a play list

data.name: msgAmpRemoteError
data.value: amp# remote connection error: {0}{1}|Something wrong with the amp# remote connection API with an error message

data.name: msgSelectAlbum
data.value: Select Album|A tool-tip message describing a button to select a music album

data.name: msgPhotoAlbumExit
data.value: Exit|A tool-tip for a photo album browser exit button

data.name: msgPhotoAlbumNext
data.value: Next photo|A tool-tip to indicate that a button would select a next photo from a photo album

data.name: msgPhotoAlbumPrevious
data.value: Previous photo|A tool-tip to indicate that a button would select a previous photo from a photo album

data.name: msgPhotoRotateClockwise
data.value: Rotate clockwise|A tool-tip to indicate that a button would rotate a photo clockwise

data.name: msgPhotoRotateCounterClockwise
data.value: Rotate counterclockwise|A tool-tip to indicate that a button would rotate a photo counterclockwise

data.name: msgPhotoDescription
data.value: {0}/{1}: '{2}' [{3}]|A tool-tip for a position of a photo in a photo album, description for a photo and its take time

data.name: msgBindExceptionLogger
data.value: Binding exception logger|As in bind the application global exception logger

data.name: msgConfigureTMDbClient
data.value: Configure the TMDb client|As in configure the TMdbEasy client and get its configuration

data.name: msgDatabaseCacheLoading
data.value: Database cache loading|As in data from the SQLite database is being cached in to the memory

data.name: msgDone
data.value: ..done.|As in some operation is done

data.value: Initialize Chromium Embedded Framework settings

data.value: Initialize GeckoFx engine|As in initialize the GeckoFX web browser engine

data.name: msgLoadChromiumEmbeddedFramework
data.value: Load Chromium Embedded Framework

data.name: msgLocalization
data.value: Localization|As in localize the main form

data.name: msgPercentage
data.value: {0} %|An indicator of percentage

data.name: msgReady
data.value: Ready|As in some operation is ready

data.name: msgVisualStyles
data.value: Visual styles|As in initializing the visual styles

data.name: msgSelectFolder
data.value: Select a folder|A dialog requests a user to select a folder

data.name: msgDatabasePhotoCacheLoading
data.value: Database photo file information cache loading|As in data from the SQLite database from the V_PHOTOALBUM view is being cached in to the memory

data.name: msgMsgDatabaseMediaLocationCacheLoading
data.value: Database media location cache loading|As in data from the SQLite database from the MEDIALOCATION and from the PHOTOALBUM tables are being cached in to the memory

data.name: msgNewPhotoAlbum
data.value: New photo album|A text describing a new photo album

data.name: msgPhotoAlbumExists
data.value: Photo album with the given name already exists|As in a photo album with the given name already exists

data.name: msgSQLFileFilter
data.value: SQL Script Files|*.sql|A filter for SQL script files

data.name: msgXMLFileFilter
data.value: XML Files|*.xml|A filter for XML (Extensible Markup Language) files

data.name: msgErrorInScript
data.value: A script error occurred on the database update|Something failed during running the database update script

data.name: msgSQLSentenceError
data.value: An error occurred while running a SQL transaction to the database.|As in a some kind of error occurred while running an arbitrary SQL against the SQLite database

data.value: vamp# photo album editor|A title for the photo album editor
